description:
Tree pruning and felling in the Barnsbury Conservation area

1)Right side of block 100 - X5 Limes and X4 London Planes, reduce back to previous points.

2)Between blocks 100 - 200, X1 Large Alder, 20 % crown reduction. X1 Dead Alder, Fell.

3)Between blocks 200 - 300, X5 London Planes, reduce back to previous points. X6 Alders, 20 % crown reduction. X1 Dead Alder, fell
4)Between blocks 300 - 400, X2 Alders, 20 % crown reduction.

5)Between blocks 400 - 500, X5 London Planes, reduce back to previous points. X1 Dead Alder, fell.

6)Between blocks 500 - 600, X3 London Planes, reduce back to previous points.

7)Front of estate, X6 Limes and X2 Sycamores, reduce back to previous points.

All trees are located on the estate of 600 Samuel Lewis Buildings, Liverpool Road, N1 1LP.
decision_conditions: The council expects to see 3 replacement trees planted in the same location that the trees will be removed from. The species and size is to be agreed with the Tree Preservation Officer prior to planting. Replacement trees are to be planted within one planting season.
